name: Snow Leopard scrollbars
description:
This style changes the scrollbars to closely mimic the look of the dock scrollbars in Mac OS X Snow Leopard.

Complete the Snow Leopard series with these styles:
style 20883
style 21763
style 24273
style 21832
style 24724
style 28658

*** UPDATES ***

12-19-10: Updated appearance to closely match the stack scrollbars
02-20-10: Added scrollbar background.
02-12-10: Reverted the recent appearance change due to a few requests.
02-11-10: Fixed bug where theme scrollbar images would show (e.g. Vfox3).
02-11-10: Updated scrollbar thumb appearance.
02-10-10: An entirely new look to match the scrollbars in the Snow Leopard stacks (Firefox 3.6 only).
02-09-10: Added new scrollbar button images.
02-05-10: New effect when scrollbar thumb is pressed, to fix some bugs while still looking good.
02-05-10: Fixed bug where theme scrollbar images would show (e.g. Vfox3).
02-04-10: Fixed bug where glow would not show when clicking anywhere on the scrollbar.
